author: Reuters Editorial
title: Pure Storage Inc Q4 ‍GAAP Net Loss Per Share $0.05​
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Pure Storage Inc:
* PURE STORAGE ANNOUNCES RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY ‍GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.05​ * QTRLY ‍NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13​
* QTRLY ‍GAAP REVENUE $338.3 MILLION VERSUS $227.9 MILLION ​
* SEES ‍ Q1 2019 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN IN RANGE OF 63.5% TO 66.5%​
* SEES ‍FULL YEAR FISCAL 2019 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $1.310 BILLION TO $1.360 BILLION​
* SEES ‍FULL YEAR FISCAL 2019 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN IN RANGE OF 63.5% TO 66.5%​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.07, REVENUE VIEW $331.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 REVENUE VIEW $1.33 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
